tool_description: When provided with the URL of an image, this API will remove the background from it, and return you image data of the image without the background.
name: Image background removal
title: Image background removal

api_list.name: BackgroundRemover
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://image-background-removal3.p.rapidapi.com/BackgroundRemoverLambda"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "image-background-removal3.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

import requests

url = "https://image-background-removal3.p.rapidapi.com/BackgroundRemoverLambda"
